Agreement in restraint of trade, void. Previous Next Previous Next Disclaimer User Guide Contact Us Content Provided by the Ministries/Departments in the Government of India. metadata.snippet: Every agreement by which any one is restrained from exercising a lawful profession, trade or business of any kind, is to that extent void.
